summary: I\'ve finally decided to post a visual mod of my own, this is the combination of files from various modders but most of the base files i tweaked come from \"heliosDoubleSix\"s \"Cinematic Lighting ENB - CLENB - by HD6\" found here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4142
descriptionHtml:
To my eyes this is the best visual experience ive come across andd ont really deserve any praise for it as its just files taken, tweaked and complied into this complete product

Any questions or feedback are appreciated

you can enable and disable this enb ingame by pressing Shift+f12

----Installation----
simply extract the files using winrar into the skyrim folder located by default C:/Program Files/Steam/Steamapps/Common/Skyrim
NOT the data folder
Cannot attach my skyrimprefs or skyrim ini files so i will post them in the description for you to change yours if you wish to

PS. I am no real modder, just one who uses them.

PPS. I repeat that I am not the author and take no credit for any work done. this is simply a reupload of tweaked files which i wish to share with you from my personal preferences (original authors notes retained within certain files)


//////////////////Skyrim.ini\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\


[General]
sLanguage=ENGLISH

uExterior Cell Buffer=64
uGridsToLoad=7

[Display]
fShadowLODMaxStartFade=1000.0
fSpecularLODMaxStartFade=2000.0
fLightLODMaxStartFade=3500.0
iShadowMapResolutionPrimary=4096
bAllowScreenshot=1
fNearDistance=18.0000

[Audio]
fMusicDuckingSeconds=6.0
fMusicUnDuckingSeconds=8.0
fMenuModeFadeOutTime=3.0
fMenuModeFadeInTime=1.0

[Grass]
bAllowCreateGrass=1
bAllowLoadGrass=0

[GeneralWarnings]
SGeneralMasterMismatchWarning=One or more plugins could not find the correct versions of the master files they depend on. Errors may occur during load or game play. Check the \"Warnings.txt\" file for more information.

[Archive]
sResourceArchiveList=Skyrim - Misc.bsa, Skyrim - Shaders.bsa, Skyrim - Textures.bsa, HighResTexturePack01.bsa, HighResTexturePack02.bsa, HighResTexturePackFix.bsa,, Skyrim - Interface.bsa, Skyrim - Animations.bsa, Skyrim - Meshes.bsa, Skyrim - Sounds.bsa
sResourceArchiveList2=Skyrim - Voices.bsa, Skyrim - VoicesExtra.bsa

[Combat] 
fMagnetismStrafeHeadingMult=0.0 
fMagnetismLookingMult=0.0 
f1PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7 
f3PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7 

[Papyrus]
fPostLoadUpdateTimeMS=500.0
bEnableLogging=0
bEnableTrace=0
bLoadDebugInformation=0

[Water]
bReflectLODObjects=1
bReflectLODLand=1
bReflectSky=1
bReflectLODTrees=1

[Actor] 
fVisibleNavmeshMoveDist=12288.0000 

[MapMenu]

fMapWorldMinPitch=0.0000
fMapWorldYawRange=3600.0000
bWorldMapNoSkyDepthBlur=1
fWorldMapNearDepthBlurScale=0
fWorldMapDepthBlurScale=0
